article.title: Staff Directory - U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi
article.summary: Contact the staff of the U.S. Export Assistance Center in Mississippi.
article.content:
​Mississippi U.S. Export Assistance Center

Mississippi e-Center at JSU

1230 Raymond Road, Box 600

Jackson, MS 39204

Phone: 601-373-0773

Fax: 601-373-0959

Website:www.buyusa.gov/jackson


Director

Carol Moore

Phone: 601-373-0773

Fax: 3601-73-0959

Email:Carol.Moore@trade.gov


International Trade Specialists

Glenn Ferreri

Phone: 601-373-0849

Fax: 601-373-0959

Email:Glenn.Ferreri@trade.gov

​​

Jessica Gordon

Phone: 601-373-0784

Fax: 373-0959

Email:Jessica.Gordon@trade.gov​
